name: Creatures of Purgatory
description:
Story

You've suddenly been transported to this twisted world of rust and flesh by powerful entities for their entertainment.

How long will you survive in this dimension of horrors?

Gameplay

Creatures of Purgatory is a survival horror game with an arcade twist. Your goal isn't to get out, but to last as long as possible and beat your own high score.

You'll be able to pick a collection of levels and monsters and have to figure out how to last the longest.

Collect scrap to craft items because the monsters keep getting more and more challenging the longer you last.
